strings.Value: "Trolls usually treat kobolds like annoying moths... I wonder what that Tartuccio could have told them?"
"In the end, he's a magician. Magic trickery can make an unforgettable impression on the uneducated barbarian mind."
"Whatever it is, an alliance like this is bad news for everyone else."
"Maybe they just like the color purple? Or was he able to offer them something they truly desire? Or perhaps he's the first kobold clever enough to learn the language of the giants!"
